title: Giant animal
text: I heard the loudest sound, it's hard to explian. Almost like a deep groan. Sounded close, so went to investigate.
While it wasn't as close as I first thought, thats because the creature that made it was massive, a good two maybe even three times the size of my ship.
Thankfully it was a herbivore. It had no problem just walking up to me, forcing me to move out of its way.
